title: Quarkus is using Micrometer version that is reaching EOL
body:
### Describe the bug

Quarkus [still uses](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/baf77db720ab5794a1b152c87a01df3c291f864e/bom/application/pom.xml#L38) Micrometer 1.12.x while 1.13.x is already available. Branch 1.12.x [will reach end of support in November 2024](https://micrometer.io/support/).

### Expected behavior

Quarkus uses supported Micrometer version.

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

Originally reported by @ahrycej in https://github.com/keycloak/keycloak/issues/31896.
